items.sentence: Tom needed to store his stuff somewhere, so I told him he could put it in our garage.
Tom said that he didn\'t believe that Mary really planned on going bowling with John.
Tom\'s car was last seen in the neighborhood the day before his ex-wife was murdered.
Tom hoped that the doctors would tell him that he didn\'t need the surgery after all.
Tom still rides the bicycle that his parents gave him when he was thirteen years old.
